== Kureekkad (CT) (628014) ==

Kureekkad (CT) is a town in the [[Kanayannur]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 5.3 sq. km. and harbouring 3448 households with total population of 13348 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 15 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 235 km. Male population is 6459 and female population is 6889. Scheduled Caste population is 1460 and Scheduled Tribes population is 86. Census Location Code of the town is 628014<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 15 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 15 km. Railway station is at Kureekkad at a distance of 0 km.
